item.description: Dare to drive to Stamford you meetup singles. THis is our mid week singles mixed VIP group party. Starts off with a fun sexy dance lesson to meet everyone, all levels- then drinks, appetizers-if you like  bring your favorite wine, or appetizer to share-will have also- then dancing to mixed music-or hang- then 9:30pm Make Maria Laugh contest- to win a prize- you have 60 sec. to tell your best joke, improv, skit  etc. I am recovering from a foot surgery and need to laugh. Door entrance of $25 to help with staff,supplies- if you pre- pay its $20 You must be single to attend. Costumes welcome jump in..

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: Mid Week Single ALmost Halloween mixer at my dance studio
